IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PRIVATE BOARDING SCHOOL FOR GIRLS IN GRADES 6-12 SERVING APPROXIMATELY 182 STUDENTS, OFFERING BOTH BOARDING AND DAY STUDENT PROGRAMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: COMMITTED TO EXCELLENCE IN THE EDUCATION OF YOUNG WOMEN. LINDEN HALL PROVIDES A RIGOROUS AND MULTIFACETED COLLEGE PREPATORY EXPERIENCE.
IRS990.Desc: LINDEN HALL SCHOOL FOR GIRLS PROVIDES AN EXCEPTIONAL EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCE FOR YOUNG WOMEN. HERE, EACH STUDENT IS NURTURED AND INSPIRED TO REACH HER HIGHEST PERSONAL POTENTIAL. WE ARE A DIVERSE COMMUNITY OF LIFE-LONG LEARNERS, SET IN A STRUCTURED, FAMILY-CENTERED ENVIRONMENT. OUR COMMUNITY VALUES SCHOLARLY ACHIEVEMENT, CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT, CULTURAL AWARENESS, AND PHYSICAL WELLNESS, AS IT STRIVES TO PREPARE YOUNG WOMEN TO ASSUME THE LEADERSHIP ROLES OF THEIR GENERATION.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: BOARD CO-CHAIR; LONG RANGE PLANNING CHAIR

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE FOR AWARDING SCHOLARSHIPS.

THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS THE STANDARDS FOR ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES ACCORDING TO THE PRINCIPLES OF ASC 740, INCOME TAXES, WHICH PRESCRIBES A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD AND MEASUREMENT ATTRIBUTE FOR THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT RECOGNITION AND MEASUREMENT OF A TAX POSITION TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA REQUIRE MANAGEMENT TO EVALUATE THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE ORGANIZATION INCLUDING WHETHER THE ENTITY IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES. MANAGEMENT EVALUATED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN AND CONCLUDED THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAD TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THEREFORE, NO PROVISION OR LIABILITY FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN INCLUDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, THE ORGANIZATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY THE U.S. FEDERAL, STATE, OR LOCAL TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS BEFORE 2013.
FINANCIAL AID EXPENSES 1,322,111. FULTON INVESTMENT FEES 12,588. CHANGE IN PERPETUAL TRUSTS 13,238. RECLASS TO MISCELLANEOUS REVENUE 15.
FULTON INVESTMENT FEES 12,588. FINANCIAL AID EXPENSES 1,322,111. RECLASS TO MISCELLANEOUS REVENUE 15.
IT IS LISTED ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE IN THE ADMISSION AREA AND IS ALSO STATED ON THE APPLICATION FOR ENROLLMENT.

ForeignIndividualsGrantsGrp.RegionTxt: EAST ASIA - CHINA, HONG KONG, SOUTH KOREA, THAILAND
CENTRAL AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN - JAMAICA

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS RECORDS OF THE SCHOLARSHIPS AND FINANCIAL AID THAT ARE AWARDED EACH YEAR. ALL OF THE AWARD NOTIFICATIONS ARE GENERATED BY THE ADMISSION OFFICE. ANY AWARDS ACCEPTED ARE RECORDED BY THE BUSINESS OFFICE SO THAT THESE AWARDS ARE REFLECTED ON THE STUDENT'S STATEMENTS. ALL GRANTS, FINANCIAL AID, OR SCHOLARSHIPS ARE CREDITED DIRECTLY BY THE ORGANIZATION AGAINST THE STUDENT'S TUITION ACCOUNT TO REDUCE THE AMOUNTS DUE FOR THAT PERIOD. NO ACTUAL CASH IS EXCHANGED. SCHOLARSHIP AWARDS ARE GRANTED BASED ON ABOVE AVERAGE PERFORMANCE ON CERTAIN ACADEMIC TESTS. SCHOLARSHIP AWARDS GENERALLY RANGE FROM 25% TO 90% OF TUITION, THOUGH IT VARIES EACH YEAR DEPENDING ON THE APPLICATION POOL.

THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS RECORDS OF THE SCHOLARSHIPS AND FINANCIAL AID THAT ARE AWARDED EACH YEAR. ALL OF THE AWARD NOTIFICATIONS ARE GENERATED BY THE ADMISSION OFFICE. ANY AWARDS ACCEPTED ARE RECORDED BY THE BUSINESS OFFICE SO THAT THESE AWARDS ARE REFLECTED ON THE STUDENT'S STATEMENTS. ALL GRANTS, FINANCIAL AID, OR SCHOLARSHIPS ARE CREDITED DIRECTLY BY THE ORGANIZATION AGAINST THE STUDENT'S TUITION ACCOUNT TO REDUCE THE AMOUNTS DUE FOR THAT PERIOD. NO ACTUAL CASH IS EXCHANGED. SCHOLARSHIP AWARDS ARE GRANTED BASED ON ABOVE AVERAGE PERFORMANCE ON CERTAIN ACADEMIC TESTS. SCHOLARSHIP AWARDS GENERALLY RANGE FROM 25% TO 90% OF TUITION, THOUGH IT VARIES EACH YEAR DEPENDING ON THE APPLICATION POOL. AS FOR FINANCIAL AID, THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES EACH FAMILY TO COMPLETE AN APPLICATION THROUGH NAIS SCHOOL AND STUDENT SERVICES. THE SSS EVALUATES A FAMILY'S POTENTIAL CONTRIBUTION TO TUITION. THE FINANCIAL AID COMMITTEE WORKS TO MEET THE DEMONSTRATED NEED OF THE SSS REPORT. THE SSS RECOMMENDATIONS ARE USED AS A GUIDELINE FOR FINANCIAL AID DECISIONS, AS THE ORGANIZATION MUST CONSIDER HOW THE NUMBER OF APPLICATIONS AND THE SIZE OF THE AWARDS WILL AFFECT THE BUDGET.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COPIES ARE DISTRIBUTED TO THE SCHOOL'S TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW AND THEN DISCUSSION DURING A SCHEDULED BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT IS COMPLETED BY EACH BOARD MEMBER ON AN ANNUAL BASIS AT LEAST. THE BOARD SECRETARY REVIEWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS PRIOR TO BOARD MEETINGS AT WHICH A VOTE WILL TAKE PLACE IN ORDER TO IDENTIFY KNOWN CONFLICTS. THE BOARD CO-CHAIRS MAKE A VERBAL REQUEST FOR SELF-IDENTIFICATION OF ADDITIONAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST PRIOR TO DISCUSSION AND VOTING ON ANY ITEMS. ANY MEMBER WITH A CONFLICT OF INTEREST ABSTAINS FROM VOTING ON THAT PARTICULAR ITEM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WORKS WITH OUTSIDE CONSULTANTS TO DETERMINE THE APPROPRIATE COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. COMPARATIVE DATA IS USED IN THIS PROCESS. IN ADDITION, THE PROCESS AND DECISION IS DOCUMENTED IN THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND TAX RETURNS FOR THE PREVIOUS THREE YEARS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
